per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(6*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=ob_r = 1-abs(wave_r);
per_frame_7=ob_b = 1-abs(wave_b);
per_frame_8=ob_g = 1-abs(wave_g);
per_frame_9=ib_r = 1-abs(ob_r);
per_frame_10=ib_g = 1-abs(ob_g);
per_frame_11=ib_b = 1-abs(ob_b);
per_frame_12=wave_x = wave_x + 0.2*sin(int(rand(100))*0.01*time);
per_frame_13=wave_y = wave_y + 0.2*sin(int(rand(100))*0.01*time);
per_frame_14=q1 = wave_r;
per_frame_15=q2 = wave_g;
per_frame_16=q3 = wave_b;
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=zoom = zoom - abs(19*dx_r*tan(0.4 + 0.4*sin(4*time)-rad));
per_pixel_7=rot = rot - 0.5*(1-rad*sin(y*time)*abs(cos(1-rad*sin(x*time))))*rad;
per_pixel_8=cx = cx + 24*dx_r*abs(0.5*cos(cos(time)-1.8*rad)*rad)*sin((1.5-x)*time);
per_pixel_9=cx = cy + 24*dy_r*abs(0.5*cos(sin(time)-1.8*rad)*rad)*cos((1.5-y)*time);
per_pixel_10=sx = sx - 6*dx_r*abs(0.5*cos(sin(time)-1.5*rad)*rad)*sin((1.5-x)*time);
per_pixel_11=sy = sy - 6*dy_r*abs(0.5*cos(cos(time)-1.5*rad)*rad)*cos((1.5-y)*time);
